author: rhuijben
msg: Implement a simple upgrade scenario for old style externals to the
EXTERNALS store in format 29: register all declared externals as externals of
on unknown kind from the default repository.
Disable the trigger insertion code that was originally scheduled for format
29 as discussion on this topic an Julian's last mail suggested that this code
will be replaced by temporary triggers that will only be inserted when starting
(bump_to_29): Remove malfunction. Upgrade externals. Don't insert
(svn_wc__db_upgrade_apply_props): Fetch kind and upgrade externals when
(text_base_path): Handle pre and post format 29 pristine paths to make it
